lyrics:
46 contributorstranslationsрусскийdull knives lyricsverse 1
im holding my breath holding so tight
nothing is wrong nothing is right
im in the dark looking for light
wont someone please save my life
inside im a mess but i dont let it show
im just hanging on but youd never know
i smile all day and cry through the night
wont someone please save my
life is fleeting

chorus
dull knives taking my life
a slow burn fire from the inside
dull knives twisting my spine
theyre taking their time time
til i lose my mind

verse 2
a smoldering flame deep in my heart
barely a sign its barely a spark
holding on through every night
wont someonе please save my lifе
im crying for help its such a cliché
invisible pain its filling each day
i open my mouth and feed you a lie
wont someone please save
my life is fleeting no repeating
see imagine dragons liveget tickets as low as 120you might also likechorus
dull knives taking my life
a slow burn fire from the inside
dull knives twisting my spine
theyre taking their time time
til i lose my mind

spare me the ride

guitar solo

from the inside
